channel.title: How to load audio files / Create Tables
channel.description:

But how do i get the axoloti to see and read lets say a 606 samplekit thats placed on the sdcard
I tried do some searching in the forum but didt not really find anything..
maybe someone in here could help me out

item.title: How to load audio files / Create Tables
item.dc:creator: @keyman Antonio Machado
item.description:
@keyman wrote:

Load sample from Sd to waveplayer crashes

The current wave/play objects assume the file format and samplerate. Raw 48kHz 16 bit, mono or stereo. If it is a .wav file, it will "just play" the .wav header too, resulting in a brief click at the start. It will play any file, jpg, avi, xls, whatever, but simply as raw data.

Don't make the files names longer than MAXIMUM 8 characters

use audacity (or similar) export as RAW (with wav extension) 48000khz, 16 bit PCM

Read full topic
item.source: How to load audio files / Create Tables
